text: is one of the eleven wards in the Japanese city of Kyoto in Kyoto Prefecture on the island of Honshu.Deal, William E. (2005). Handbook to Life in Medieval and Early Modern Japan, p. 70. In Fushimi ward, Fushimi Inari-taisha, tombs of Emperor Kanmu and of Emperor Meiji are situated. ==References== ==Other websites== * Fushimi City website Category:Kyoto
title: Fushimi, Kyoto
